summary: Feature request to change eager decoding of static workflow summary/details to lazy loading in the TypeScript client. Currently these are decoded immediately; the request is to defer decoding until the data is actually requested.
userImpact: Users may experience better client performance and reduced memory usage by deferring unnecessary decoding operations until workflow summary/details are actually accessed.
proposedFix: Change the client implementation to defer decoding of static workflow summary and details until they are explicitly requested rather than decoding them eagerly.
resolutionDetails: The issue was closed, indicating the lazy loading feature was implemented.
keyQuote: Today we eagerly decode these, change to be lazy upon request.
